005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.impl.DefaultContainerModelChoiceGroupSupport;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
010
011import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
012import java.util.Map;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016/**
017 * A choice group model builder.
018 * <p>
019 * Is extended to support other model builders (i.e. choice and assembly model
020 * builders).
021 *
022 * @param <NMI>
023 *          the named model instance Java type
024 * @param <FI>
025 *          the field instance Java type
026 * @param <AI>
027 *          the assembly instance Java type
028 * @see DefaultChoiceModelBuilder for a choice model builder
029 * @see DefaultAssemblyModelBuilder for an assembly model builder
030 */
031@SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
032public class DefaultChoiceGroupModelBuilder<
033    NMI extends INamedModelInstance,
034    FI extends IFieldInstance,
035    AI extends IAssemblyInstance> {
036
037  // collections to store model instances
038  @NonNull
039  private final Map<Integer, NMI> namedModelInstances = new LinkedHashMap<>();
040  @NonNull
041  private final Map<Integer, FI> fieldInstances = new LinkedHashMap<>();
042  @NonNull
043  private final Map<Integer, AI> assemblyInstances = new LinkedHashMap<>();
044
045  /**
046   * Append the instance.
047   *
048   * @param instance
049   *          the instance to append
050   */
051  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
052  public void append(@NonNull FI instance) {
053    Integer key = instance.getQName().getIndexPosition();
054    namedModelInstances.put(key, (NMI) instance);
055    fieldInstances.put(key, instance);
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Append the instance.
060   *
061   * @param instance
062   *          the instance to append
063   */
064  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
065  public void append(@NonNull AI instance) {
066    Integer key = instance.getQName().getIndexPosition();
067    namedModelInstances.put(key, (NMI) instance);
068    assemblyInstances.put(key, instance);
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * Get the appended named model instances.
073   *
074   * @return the instances or an empty map if no instances were appended
075   */
076  @NonNull
077  protected Map<Integer, NMI> getNamedModelInstances() {
078    return namedModelInstances;
079  }
080
081  /**
082   * Get the appended field instances.
083   *
084   * @return the instances or an empty map if no instances were appended
085   */
086  @NonNull
087  protected Map<Integer, FI> getFieldInstances() {
088    return fieldInstances;
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * Get the appended assembly instances.
093   *
094   * @return the instances or an empty map if no instances were appended
095   */
096  @NonNull
097  protected Map<Integer, AI> getAssemblyInstances() {
098    return assemblyInstances;
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * Build an immutable choice group model container based on the appended
103   * instances.
104   *
105   * @return the container
106   */
107  @NonNull
108  public IContainerModelSupport<NMI, NMI, FI, AI> buildChoiceGroup() {
109    return getNamedModelInstances().isEmpty()
110        ? IContainerModelSupport.empty()
111        : new DefaultContainerModelChoiceGroupSupport<>(
112            CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(getNamedModelInstances()),
113            CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(getFieldInstances()),
114            CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(getAssemblyInstances()));
115  }
116}
